text: David Marrero and Santiago Ventura were the defending champions but decided not to participate. Lukáš Rosol and Igor Zelenay won the final after beating Martin Fischer and Andreas Haider-Maurer 6–3, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==External links== * Main Draw Open Barletta Trofeo Dimiccoli and Boraccino - Doubles 2011 Doubles
title: 2011 Open Barletta Trofeo Dimiccoli & Boraccino – Doubles
